solution_line_template: A quarter is worth five nickels because {quarter_value} / {nickel_value} = <<{quarter_value}/{nickel_value}={nickels_per_quarter}>>{nickels_per_quarter}
She gets {total_nickels} nickels from the bank because {num_quarters} x {nickels_per_quarter} = <<{num_quarters}*{nickels_per_quarter}={total_nickels}>>{total_nickels}
{num_iron_nickels} of the nickels are iron nickels because {total_nickels} x {iron_nickel_percent} = <<{total_nickels}*{iron_nickel_percent}={num_iron_nickels}>>{num_iron_nickels}
{num_regular_nickels} of the nickels are regular because {total_nickels} - {num_iron_nickels} = <<{total_nickels}-{num_iron_nickels}={num_regular_nickels}>>{num_regular_nickels}
The iron nickels are worth ${total_iron_value} because {num_iron_nickels} x {iron_nickel_value} = <<{num_iron_nickels}*{iron_nickel_value}={total_iron_value}>>{total_iron_value}
The regular nickels are worth ${total_regular_value} because {num_regular_nickels} x {nickel_value} = <<{num_regular_nickels}*{nickel_value}={total_regular_value}>>{total_regular_value}
Her money is now worth ${total_value} because {total_iron_value} + {total_regular_value} = <<{total_iron_value}+{total_regular_value}={total_value}>>{total_value}
